name: AsyncWebServer_WT32_ETH01
description: Asynchronous HTTP and WebSocket Server Library for WT32_ETH01 (ESP32 + LAN8720). Now supporting using CString to save heap to send very large data and with examples to demo how to use beginChunkedResponse() to send large html in chunks
keywords: http, async, async-webserver, websocket, webserver, esp32, wt32-eth01, lan8720, lan8720a
